## Change Log Entry For Release Updates

Please fill out the following JSON structure with the relevant details for this pull request.

```json
{
    "Date": "",  // Provide the date of the update
    "Category": "",  // Specify the category of the update (e.g., feature, bug fix, improvement)
    "Title": "",  // Title of the update
    "Preview": "",  // Provide a short preview of the update (max 500 characters)
    "BusinessValues": [
        {
            "Item1": ""  // Describe the first business value (max 300 characters)
        },
        {
            "Item2": ""  // Describe the second business value
        },
        {
            "Item3": ""  // Describe the third business value
        }
    ],
    "Highlights": [
        {
            "Highlight1": ""  // First highlight of the update (max 256 characters)
        },
        {
            "Highlight2": ""  // Second highlight
        },
        {
            "Highlight3": ""  // Third highlight
        }
    ],
    "Updates": {
        "Task Automation": [
            {
                "name": "New Automation Feature",
                "description": "Describe what this feature does and how it helps automate tasks."
            }
        ],
        "Workflow Customization": [
            {
                "name": "New Customization Option",
                "description": "Explain how this update allows for further customization of workflows."
            }
        ]
    },
    "Deprecations": {
        "Deprecations": [
            {
                "Feature": "Name of the Deprecated Feature",
                "Alternative": "Description of the Alternative Feature or Approach"
            }
        ]
    },
    "BugFixes": {
        "Bug Fixes": [
            {
                "Description": "Name of the bug fixes 1",
                "Impact": "low"  // Options: "low", "medium", "high", "critical"
            },
            {
                "Description": "Name of the bug fixes 2",
                "Impact": "medium"  // Options: "low", "medium", "high", "critical"
            }
        ]
    },
    "KnownIssues": [
        {
            "Issue1": ""  // Description of the first known issue (max 300 characters)
        },
        {
            "Issue2": ""  // Description of the second known issue
        }
    ]
}
